title: James River Church Celebrates Global Release of Full-Length Album - Glorious
description: On Friday, August 22, James River Church's worship collective, James River Worship, will release a full-length album titled Glorious. The highly anticipated debut album will feature 12 original tracks, including the newly released singles "Stronghold Walls," "Abba Father," and "All Things New."
content:
James River Church announces the global release of Glorious, the debut worship album from James River Worship, available August 22, 2025. Recorded live at James River Church, the 12-track album showcases original songs of praise that will stream worldwide on all major platforms.

SPRINGFIELD, Mo., Aug. 21, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- On Friday, August 22, 's worship collective, James River Worship, will release a full-length album titled Glorious. The highly anticipated debut album will feature 12 original tracks, including the newly released singles "Stronghold Walls," "Abba Father," and "All Things New."

The full worship album was recorded live during a worship service at James River Church on January 19, 2025.

"We pray that this album will resonate around the world," says Brandon Lindell, Executive Ministries Pastor at James River Church. "Worship music has the power to inspire and transform, inviting God into our lives in a deeply personal way when we experience His very presence."

With plans to reach a global audience, James River Worship is working to translate "Stronghold Walls" into Spanish, Dutch, Russian, and Japanese.

"Glorious" will be available for streaming on all major music platforms, including Spotify, Apple Music, YouTube, and Amazon. Powerful music videos accompanying each song can be found on . Learn more at .

About James River Church:

James River Church is a dynamic, multi-campus church known for its vibrant worship, inspiring teaching, and dedication to serving communities worldwide through their thriving online presence. Established in 1991, the church hosts events that encourage connection, faith, and outreach, impacting lives locally and globally with the Gospel of Jesus Christ. Learn more at

Attn. News Directors / Assignment Desk: Members of the media are invited and highly encouraged to cover this community outreach. To request interviews, please call Becky Davis, Director of Communications at James River Church, at 417-581-5433
summary: James River Church, a multi-campus church in Springfield, Missouri, has announced the global release of its debut worship album, Glorious, which will be available on August 22, 2025. The 12-track album was recorded live at James River Church and will stream worldwide on all major platforms. The album will include singles such as "Stronghold Walls," "Abba Father," and "All Things New". James River Worship is working to translate "Glorious" into Spanish, Dutch, Russian, and Japanese.
shortSummary: James River Church will release its debut full-length album, "Glorious," featuring 12 original tracks, streaming globally on August 22.

scraped_sources.text:
James River Church announces the global release of Glorious, the debut worship album from James River Worship, available August 22, 2025. Recorded live at James River Church, the 12-track album showcases original songs of praise that will stream worldwide on all major platforms.
SPRINGFIELD, Mo., Aug. 21, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- On Friday, August 22, James River Church's worship collective, James River Worship, will release a full-length album titled Glorious. The highly anticipated debut album will feature 12 original tracks, including the newly released singles "Stronghold Walls," "Abba Father," and "All Things New."
The full worship album was recorded live during a worship service at James River Church on January 19, 2025.
"We pray that this album will resonate around the world," says Brandon Lindell, Executive Ministries Pastor at James River Church. "Worship music has the power to inspire and transform, inviting God into our lives in a deeply personal way when we experience His very presence."
With plans to reach a global audience, James River Worship is working to translate "Stronghold Walls" into Spanish, Dutch, Russian, and Japanese.
"Glorious" will be available for streaming on all major music platforms, including Spotify, Apple Music, YouTube, and Amazon. Powerful music videos accompanying each song can be found on James River Worship's YouTube channel. Learn more at https://jamesriverworship.com.
About James River Church:
James River Church is a dynamic, multi-campus church known for its vibrant worship, inspiring teaching, and dedication to serving communities worldwide through their thriving online presence. Established in 1991, the church hosts events that encourage connection, faith, and outreach, impacting lives locally and globally with the Gospel of Jesus Christ. Learn more at https://jamesriver.church
Attn. News Directors / Assignment Desk: Members of the media are invited and highly encouraged to cover this community outreach. To request interviews, please call Becky Davis, Director of Communications at James River Church, at 417-581-5433
Contact Details:
Contact: Becky Davis
Organization: James River Church
Phone: 417-581-5433
E-mail: [email protected]
SOURCE James River Church

Innan du fortsätter till YouTube
Vi använder cookies och data för att
- leverera och underhålla Googles tjänster
- spåra avbrott och skydda mot spam, bedrägeri och otillåten användning
- mäta målgruppsengagemang och webbplatsstatistik så att vi kan analysera hur våra tjänster används och förbättra tjänsternas kvalitet.
Om du väljer knappen Godkänn alla använder vi även cookies och data för att
- utveckla och förbättra nya tjänster
- leverera annonser och mäta hur effektiva de är
- visa anpassat innehåll utifrån dina inställningar
- visa anpassade annonser utifrån dina inställningar
Om du väljer knappen Avvisa alla använder vi inte cookies i dessa ytterligare syften.
Innehåll och annonser utan anpassning påverkas bland annat av vad du tittar på för tillfället och din plats (annonser visas utifrån din ungefärliga plats). Innehåll och annonser med anpassning kan även omfatta sådant som videorekommendationer, en anpassad YouTube Hem-sida och anpassade annonser utifrån tidigare aktivitet, till exempel vad du tittar på och söker efter på YouTube. Vi använder även cookies och data för att anpassa upplevelsen efter lämplighet för din målgrupp, om tillämpligt.
Välj knappen Fler alternativ för mer information, till exempel om hur du hanterar dina integritetsinställningar. Du kan även besöka g.co/privacytools när som helst.

argos_summary: James River Church announced the global release of "Glorious," the debut worship album from its worship collective James River Worship, set to drop on August 22, 2025. The 12‑track live‑recorded album, captured during a January 19 service, features new singles such as "Stronghold Walls," "Abba Father," and "All Things New." The church plans to translate the lead track into several languages and will make the album available on all major streaming platforms, accompanied by music videos on YouTube. The release reflects the church’s mission to inspire and transform through worship music worldwide.
